resources.string:
"Welcome!

 Please click the 'Convert' option below to get started. If you would like to review the instructions, please click the help button instead.


Note: This app was developed by Kevin Sanchez Hernandez as the Final Project for IT 216 at Seattle Central College."

1) Select the Unit Category. A list of available categories will appear in the category dropdown.

 2) Select the unit you want to convert from. A list of available units will appear in the dropdown.

 3) Select the unit you want to convert to. A list of available units will appear in the dropdown.

 4) Enter the numerical value you want to convert into the designated input field.

 5) Tap the "Convert!" button to perform the conversion.

 6) The converted value will be displayed at the bottom of the screen.
